It's not reproducable. From 50 files modified, it happened only once.
I'm sorry but I don't have much time helping you get this reproducable...
I had hoped the log would help finding potential issues through code review.

The log does provide us with some good information.  PDE parses the Require-Bundle header text to find the required bundles and also queries the resolver state to find BundleSpecification which represent the required bundles.  We use both to validate the Manifest correctly.

If the resolver is being kept up to date with all Manifest changes, these #'s will be the same.  So some how these got out of sync which is leading to the Exception.

Since this is not easily reproducable and doesn't appear to have a clear-cut cause, we can investigate this more post 3.3.
